subject: Attn Beneficiary Mr Randy ,  Read Well Kindly Fellow Direction Reconfirm And Fill The Form Below To Proceed And Get Back Now.
body:
From The Office Of
Mr Scott Williams
Director-Paymaster-General
United Nation Compensation
Representative West African
Fund Payment Nigeria Unit.
(GUARANTY TRUST BANK PLC) (GTB)
Mobile Phone +234 9132659586



Attn Beneficiary Mr Randy ,



Your Mail Response Notification On You Being ALIVE was well Received by us which we need to explain to you on how to proceed as was Agreed by all the ( Government Authorities Concerning Bodies Offices) which Include ( International Community) to Favor all Our Clients all Over the World as we have A guideline that Govern us which the ( American Government Department Of Treasury) And (The United Nations ) Including (Security Monitoring Authorities ) and the { IMF } Agreed on so that there will be Hitch on Our Client { Contract Fund payment Transfer} or to be Hacked by the Impostors or by the ( Anti Terrorist Agents ) that is all over the World now looking for Government and Individual Fund to Sponsor their Terrorist Activities .



Mr Randy , Kindly Reconfirm and Fill The Following Details Correctly As soon as receive it we will Immediately Forward it to the (Federal High Court Of Nigeria As Non Indigin ) and to the ( Ministry of Finance ) with the Help of the Attorney that will Stand on Your Behalf to (Swear An Affidavit For Approval ) And { Affidavit OF Claim Of Fund } from the Two Offices to process the ( Needed Back Up Certificates Documents ) for Your Fun Payment Processing .


Your Full Name : -----

Your Cell / Mobile whats App Number :------

Your Full House Address:------

A Copy of Your Passport or ID Front and Back :------

Your Occupation : ........

Your Company Name : ................

Your Country Of Origin : ........

Your Age : .............

Your Sex : .................

Your Date Of Birth : ...................


Your Banking Full Details : ...............................


We wait for your response to proceed more with the Processing and the ( Attorney Federal Judiciary High Court ) ( Needed BackUp Certificates Documents ) to Obtain OK.


My Best Regard

Mr Scott Williams
Director-Paymaster-General
United Nations Representative West African
Compensation Fund Payment Nigeria Unit.
(GUARANTY TRUST BANK PLC) (GTB)
Mobile Phone + 234 9132659586

subject: Re: Attn Beneficiary Mr Randy ,  Read Well Kindly Fellow Direction Reconfirm And Fill The Form Below To Proceed And Get Back Now.
body:
Hello Mr. Scott Williams,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to hear about the procedures and guidelines that govern your operations, especially with the involvement of such esteemed bodies like the American Government Department Of Treasury, The United Nations, Security Monitoring and the IMF.

I'm curious though, could you explain a bit more about how these anti-terrorist agents operate? It sounds quite alarming that they are looking for government and individual funds to sponsor their activities.

Also, I'd love to understand more about this process involving the Federal High Court Of Nigeria and the Ministry of Finance. How does an attorney standing on my behalf work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Randy

subject: Re: Attn Beneficiary Mr Randy ,  Your Question Has Been Answered  Below To Proceed And Get Back Now.
body:
Hello Mr. Scott Williams,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I appreciate the time and effort you've put into this. It's quite interesting to learn about the activities of these agents and how they operate around the world.

I'm curious, could you tell me more about how the United Nations and US Treasury Department are involved in this process? Also, what exactly does it mean when a fund is "None Security Guided"?

Lastly, could you explain more about the role of the Attorney Federal Judiciary High Court in this process? What kind of documents are needed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Randy
